DESCRIPTION
This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; commands.
&dhpackage; is a real time simulation game
OPTIONS
The program follows the usual GNU command line syntax, with long options starting with two dashes (`-').
--load-map savegame
Loads a saved game. The parameter to savegame is the filename in ${HOME}/.unknown-horizons/save/ without the .sqlite extension
--start-map mapname
Loads a available map. The mapname matches the displayed string in the ingame menu
--enable-unstable-feature
Activates features, that are not considered stable enough for general use yet.
-d --debug
Enables debug output for Unknwon Horizons
--debug-modules modulename
Activates the logging for the specified submodule
-h --help
Show summary of options.
FILES
${HOME}/.unknown-horizons/config.sqlite
SQlite Database containing all user settings.
${HOME}/.unknown-horizons/save
Savegame Folder containing all saved games
